quest.name: Dances with Wolves
journal: Ysaudore peers over the cliff with concern.

The area around Camp Riversmeet was once a field of rich, rolling meadows. Now it is a frozen wasteland, home to fierce, hungry wolves. Ysaudore seems intent on driving these beasts away and has entrusted you with a mission: slay three silver wolves.
You have slain the wolves as requested. Return to Ysaudore, and let her hear of your success.

Ysaudore thanks you for your hard work. Camp Riversmeet once served as a military outpost, quartering Ishgardian troops and facilitating patrols of the surrounding area. Ysaudore hopes to see the camp reclaimed and the area made safe once more.

dialogue.name: YSAUDORE
dialogue.text: Some ways beyond here lies Camp Riversmeet. The camp was once the center of luscious pastures─a prime grazing field for cattle and other livestock... Now it's home to naught more than wolves.

dialogue.name: YSAUDORE
dialogue.text: Pray help drive the beasts away with sword and spell. Slay three silver wolves─let them learn to fear us.

dialogue.name: YSAUDORE
dialogue.text: Pray drive away the creatures at Camp Riversmeet. Slay three of the silver wolves found skulking there.

dialogue.name: YSAUDORE
dialogue.text: You've already slain those horrid wolves? You have my deepest thanks.

dialogue.name: YSAUDORE
dialogue.text: There was a time when there were Ishgardian troops stationed at Camp Riversmeet. Should we recover the camp─were we able to station soldiers there again─it would make our patrols safer, let them cover more area...

dialogue.name: YSAUDORE
dialogue.text: Before long, we shall move to reclaim the camp. When that time comes, I may call upon your services again.
